website_summaries.verdict: A good middle-of-the-road antifreeze option that isn’t too cheap or expensive for general use protecting your vehicle from cold temperatures.
pros: Helps to prevent corrosion caused from moisture build up in cold temperatures
The antifreeze solution has a wide temperature range where it works effectively
cons: The gallon jug can come mislabeled with the brand’s 50/50 mix

customer_reviews.title: Most economical HOAT meeting Euro specs. No 2-EHA!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most economical of the coolants meeting the needs of VW and other European cars. I don't know if it carries the VW specification which requires testing and certification, but it's essentially the same as Pentafrost. I don't remember if my research showed that it was equivalent to G12, G12+/++, or G13 but it was one of those. Basically if you have a European car including diesels from the 1990s through 2015 or so, this is excellent stuff to use. Does NOT contain 2EHA (2-ethylhexanoic acid) which is what's in Dex-cool and dex-cool compatible HOAT and OAT coolants that eats gaskets and causes issues.
customer_reviews.author: Someone else

customer_reviews.title: WARNING:  Fine Product but Amazon compatibility is NOT ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my Honda - which is a no-no according to the manufacturer, and my mechanic. I trusted Amazon's compatibility checker and this is what came up when I searched Honda 2002 CRV coolant...it showed the green 'this fits' bar at the top. So please please ask your mechanic or use the ask feature here to ensure this works with your vehicle. I just spent a lot of money flushing this stuff out of my system and replacing it with appropriate coolant.
customer_reviews.author: Jing W.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed- ordered when I ordered my radiator so I didn’t have to deal with the idiots at the local auto parts.
customer_reviews.author: Pontifex27

customer_reviews.title: Good Coolant, But Sent Wrong Kind
customer_reviews.text: I like how the review asks me to rate the FLAVOR of this coolant. I didn't taste it, but I assume it's a 1-star taste. I ordered the 50/50 mix of this coolant. Amazon sent me the 100% concentrate. I could have returned it but it was just easier to mix it with distilled water myself. So far, so good. Replaced the red OEM Mopar coolant in an '09 Dodge Caliber.
customer_reviews.author: frosty024

customer_reviews.title: Great price for HOAT
customer_reviews.text: Great price for HOAT. Could not find this locally besides ordering from a dealership for twice the price. Highly recommend this for any 03-07 dodge 2500/3500 Cummins .
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my 2005 Mercedes C230. I've researched many forums stating that this is the best product for my car, and it is indeed working perfectly. My car gauge no longer shows it's overheating, and there is no more annoying warning light. As the product states, this coolant is used by Mercedes on all their vehicles. Some of the reasons to buy. 1) This is a 50/50 solution, so it is pre-mixed, no need to add water. Just pour into your coolant reservoir. 2) Recommended by Mercedes as their choice of coolant 3) The price is cheaper than the local retail store.
customer_reviews.author: LinT

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON packaging and shipping was great / quick
customer_reviews.text: My 2011 Chevy HHR requires DEX-COOL. Didn't want to mix standard Antifreeze with factory flavor. Couldn't seem to find any specific "DEX-COOL" at my local auto parts houses. Ordered this to meet the need. Price was reasonable, and as always ... AMAZON packaging and shipping was great / quick. Would recommend this product. NOTE: This P/N of ZERON instructs mixing with water ( 50% DEX-COOL, 50% WATER ). A "pre-mixed" ZERON was also available on AMAZON at the time of my purchase. Containers looks very similar, so look closely before you order, to make sure you're getting what you want.
customer_reviews.author: SpiceMan

customer_reviews.title: About what you'd expect in coolant / antifreeze
customer_reviews.text: No, i'm not going to taste it. This isn't even funny anymore, maybe Amazon can update the fact that people should not be asked the flavor of anti freeze coolant because if someone did drink it due to reading the fact that they should test the flavor and ended up dying, I believe Amazon would be liable. Apart from that the product is what I needed for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great coolant, good price
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2010 Ford Escape XLT with the 2.5L four cylinder engine which requires Ford Motorcraft Gold Coolant. Valvoline's Zerex G-05 is equivalent and available at a much better price. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: and that it is at least as good if not better than the pricier OE Volvo coolant
customer_reviews.text: I own a 2006 Volvo XC90 one day I received a "coolant low turn off engine" warning and checked the coolant level which was indeed very low. I'm writing this review 40 days after purchase; I have experience no issues or warnings, and that it is at least as good if not better than the pricier OE Volvo coolant.
customer_reviews.author: thatkidthere

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know your application - not great for a Porsche 928
customer_reviews.text: For some time, the Porsche 928 community thought G05 was the correct formulation to use, but its not the best application and the Zerex literature and labeling is a bit confusing about that. G48 (blue) is correctly identified as the correct coolant to use for the aluminum 928 engines that have some ferrous metals on board. You have to dig into the tech specs to figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Hager Motors

customer_reviews.title: hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great anti-freeze at a great price, in comparison to the factory recommended antifreeze that I need to use on my BMW. Instead of paying $200 for anti-freeze at the dealership, I much prefer getting a few jugs of this and doing it myself for a mere fraction of the cost. Everything arrived in great condition sealed and ready to go, made my transmit mission fluid change a breeze. I am actually going to order more just to have on hand for some top offs.
customer_reviews.author: Richie B

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money on the diluted type
customer_reviews.text: This is the only type of coolant that you should use in your second gen Dodge. I spent a long time researching it and found that this is the stuff, don't waste your money on the diluted type. Mine took two gallons of the concentrated I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Al DeLucia

customer_reviews.title: As Described and Prompt
customer_reviews.text: I needed new cookant. This one is the one my auto requires. It was a better value here for the exact same product. It was well packaged and arrived in time for the weekend. I cannot complain at all. My automobile is running great. It's a fantastic product. We all need some coolant sometime. Good seller.
customer_reviews.author: German

customer_reviews.title: ... any color" mixed with the green stuff do very bad things to cooling systems
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few 90's fords and have seen dexcool style "Add to any color" mixed with the green stuff do very bad things to cooling systems. Now my standard operating procedure when buying a used car is to drain and flush the cooling system and then refill G-05. It plays nice with most metals and I have peace of mind knowing exactly what's in there. So far, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the G-05 coolant for my HEMI. Only issue is that the jug is heavy, and wasn't packed properly by the amazon warehouse. When I received it, you could tell it was sliding around inside the box and had busted the tape open on one side and ripped the box on the other. Fortunately, the coolant jug itself was fine and performed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Horwatt

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for my 2005 Jaguar S Type R

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy flush
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat shipping to my home. Made for a quick and easy coolant flush. Packaging was very poor. Top of container was crushed making it hard to open. Surprised it did not spring a leak in the box.

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: The concentrate on Amazon is the same price as the 50/50 blend here at O'Reilys. The cost savings is great. After mixing it myself to 50/50 with distilled water it tested to -20 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: 2500mi. road trip report .
customer_reviews.text: 06 bmw 325xi N52 engine . 100% . antifreeze held up well under my driving conditions and with no topping off . wagon loaded full for holiday travel and avg 12hrs per day. MS. 65 deg. IA. low 5 deg. NE. low 19 deg. CO. low 25 deg. AR. high 70 deg. MS. high 70 deg. mixed 50/50 with distilled water .
customer_reviews.author: MR. GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Mopar replacement
customer_reviews.text: I did not have time to go searching at the dealer and parts stores (surprisingly not easy to find) for Mopar coolant and on a whim I checked Amazon. Good price and shipped Prime! Could not beat it. This stuff is the exact OEM HOAT type coolant that my 07 Chrysler T&C van takes. I was tempted to go with the store brands that said that their stuff works in a ll types of engines but the price of a head gasket, water pump, radiator - told me it was worth a little time and $.

Was concerned until I poured it in the reservoir and it was yellow.

customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great if your replacing or flushing your coolant for a TJ Wrangler or KJ Liberty. Put it in both my Jeeps and haven't had any issues. Worth it when you can find it here for cheaper than the brick and mortar stores.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Same as Motorcraft
customer_reviews.text: Same gold antifreeze that came OEM in my Ford truck. About $5 cheaper per gallon than OEM. I didn't see anything on the bottle or their web site that said "demineralized" water was required, as the other reviewer said. Just says water. While not all demineralized is distilled, all distilled water is demineralized. Those $1 gallons of distilled water at the supermarket are exactly what you need. Amazed Amazon was able to ship 3 gallons, and a case of oil, in one package that survived perfectly intact. Bottles have the foil seal on the mouths, so they they can take some bumps without leaking. Great antifreeze. Comes out crystal clear (well yellow) after 5 yrs. No rust or sediments.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as OEM fluid
customer_reviews.text: I have a Chrysler Town and Country (08) and a 01 Dodge Caravan. When you go to replace radiator fluid, you will see that there is an inscription stating that you have to use the proper fluid. Other brands of antifreeze (even the ones that say for all makes and models) will not work for Dodge and Chrysler cars, this manufacturer requires that you use HOAT radiator fluids. This product is much cheaper than the OEM MOPAR brand stuff and it works equally well and it is the HOAT type. I also like how this is not diluted so it is better value, distilled water at the grocery store is like .80 a gallon.

customer_reviews.author: Boydosan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Similar phosphate free stuff as BMW coolant and saves 40% of the cost. If you change it every two years no corrosion should occur.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Keith

customer_reviews.title: A must for Chrysler vehicles!
customer_reviews.text: After searching all of the local auto parts stores in my area I finally found it here. I have a Chrysler Sebring and found out the hard way (replaced water pump) that this is the antifreeze for Chrysler vehicles. It's a little pricey compared to the other brands but trust me it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: dee-nice324

customer_reviews.title: Yup, it works
customer_reviews.text: Whats not to like, it works and cost half what Bmw charges. Have 650/and it seems to be fine
customer_reviews.author: MylesD

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good price, fast delivery. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Anne Laird

customer_reviews.title: Needed a Dodge / HOAT alternative
customer_reviews.text: Did not want to destroy my truck with a "universal antifreeze" for the cost of a few bucks. But did not want to pay the high price for Dodge brand. This did the job....could not get it locally...so Amazon to the rescue! THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: BMW 2008
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was everything my vehicle needed. Added it myself. Will be buying this product again. Recommended for trust
customer_reviews.author: nephretite

product_meta.title: Zerex G05 Phosphate Free Antifreeze/Coolant 1 GA
product_meta.description: Size:1 GA| Style:G05| Configuration:ConcentrateThis item contains a bittering agent. Valvoline ZEREX G-05 antifreeze coolant is a long life, fully formulated, ethylene glycol-based fluid suitable for passenger cars, light trucks and heavy duty vehicles. The formulation is designed for both gasoline and diesel engines. Its lower-silicate, reduced pH, phosphate free European technology protects all cooling system metals, including aluminum, from corrosion. ZEREX G-05 is a nitrite containing coolant designed to protect diesel engine cylinder liners from cavitation. It contains deposit control additives for protection from hard water deposits and scale. The ASTM and other test data shown on this sheet reflect the high performance corrosion inhibitor package. When diluted 50% with water, ZEREX G-05 protects modern engine components from winter freezing and summer boil over. A 50% to 70% concentration range is suggested for optimum corrosion protection. ZEREX G-05 is compatible with other premium brands of coolant commonly available. It contains a high quality defoamer system and will not harm hoses, plastics or original vehicle finishes. It is also suitable for use in Cummins Deere, Detroit Diesel, Mercedes, MTU, CAT, Navistar, Isuzu and Yanmar diesel engines. ZEREX G-05 is approved by Ford North America for newer models. Call 1-800- TEAM-VAL with questions. ZEREX G-05 antifreeze coolant is approved, meets or exceeds the performance requirements of the following antifreeze specifications and/or is recommended: ASTM D3306 Cummins 14603 Approved ASTM D6210 GM 1899M GM 1825M MTU / DDC Approved Mercedes Benz Approved Perkins Diesel CAT EC-1 Mack Paccar TMC of ATA RP-329B Federal Specification A-A-870A Chrysler MS 9769 Approved Ford WSS-M97B51-A1 Approved Detroit Diesel 7SE298 Approved John Deere & Co. Approved GE Wind Turbines Approved Navistar
feature_bullets: The formulation is designed for both gasoline and diesel engines
Its lower-silicate, reduced pH, phosphate free European technology protects all cooling system metals, including aluminum, from corrosion
ZEREX G-05 is a nitrite containing coolant designed to protect diesel engine cylinder liners from cavitation. It contains deposit control additives for protection from hard water deposits and scale
ZEREX G-05 contains a high quality defoamer system and will not harm hoses, plastics or original vehicle finishes
